A B C G I M O P R S U

S

setAdapter(MVPAdapter) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.AppController
Set the adapter to support a specific library, you can define a new adapter for a given library, for example : swing, swt, gwt,...
setComponentModel(Object, Class<? extends ModelComponent>) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPBinding
For each Component supported, this method must set an instance of customized ModelComponent to define the binding rules between a component and it's property name in the associated model. if the component class is not supported than throw an IllegalArgumentException
setConverter(Converter) - Method in class org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelComponent
Modify the current specific converter of the modelComponent used to convert data in component in order to update the model
setGlobalConverter(Converter) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPBinding
Modify the current global converter used to convert data in component in order to update the model
setModel(Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPBinding
 
setPresenter(Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPBinding
 
setPropertyValue(Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelBinding
Use this method to set the current model property value, in the change event body handler, so when the component value change, the model property value must be updated.
setView(Object) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPBinding
